Description: An introduction to the development of unique sculptural objects in textile media. Students will explore three-dimensional textile processes using the floor loom and the construction method of wrapping and coiling.

Description: Exploration and development of fabric printing and dyeing including monoprinting and screen printing with emphasis on design and developing studio competency in medium as art form. Prerequisites: ARTF 14060 and 24040. Prerequisites: ARTF 14022 and 14060.
